is used to specify article abstract. You can only provide plain text in this element. --> Catherine O'Hara, who died Friday at age 71 following a brief illness, was a comedic force of nature, shining in movies like "Home Alone," "A Mighty Wind," and TV shows like "Schitt's Creek."
